EmailTemplate.description: notifies customer that contract has been fully executed
EmailTemplate.name: DOER Customer - Contract FullyExecuted
EmailTemplate.subject: Contract received - Welcome to BlueWave!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.Name},
Your BlueWave Home Solar Loan contract has been received and fully executed! You should receive your executed agreement from DocuSign shortly.
If you don't receive the fully executed contract in your email, or if you have any further questions, please reply to customercare@bluewavesolar.com to access our Customer Care team.
In order to protect you and your solar investment, our agreement requires you to add your solar system to your home insurance. Your solar system should not significantly affect your homeowner premiums, if at all. Once the system is insured, please send us documentation of current coverage to customercare@bluewavesolar.com.
Thanks for joining us to make ‘Solar for the 100%' not just a mission, but a reality. -All of us here at BlueWave and Avidia P.S. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com or (844) 786 - 4100.We’re happy to help.
